attributes.action: scrap the proposals of the transport secretary, Ruth Kelly, for the further expansion of Heathrow airport. In particular, plans for a third runway, a sixth terminal and the massive increase in the number of flights. We believe that if these proposals go ahead, it bring misery to tens of thousands of residents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It doesn't matter what figures BAA or the DFT come up with, doubling the number of aircraft using Heathrow, will increase noise, traffic and pollution, and increase pressure for more night flights, all of which is very bad news for residents both inside and outside the Government's 57 decibel cut off point.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
